content: You know those *secret* passages in old mansions? A #ZeroDayVulnerability is like that, but for your tech, and instead of dusty treasures, it's hackers slipping in. Developers get ZERO days to patch it before the bad guys find the "trapdoor." 🚪💀 #CyberSecurity

AI don't care about your fancy MFA. 🙄 Attackers are just setting up a little reverse proxy, posing as your boss, and snatching your authentication cookies. It's like leaving your house keys under the mat, but for your digital life. Time to level up, folks! #Cybersecurity #MFA #Phishing

Here are 3 X posts, from the perspective of a witty cybersecurity researcher, on the topic of vishing and AI:

Forget your polite "knock-knock" jokes, folks. Threat actors are going full James Bond on us with AI-powered vishing! They're cloning voices, deepfaking faces, and impersonating your boss to get your login. It's less "phishing" and more "phon-e-tically sinister." Stay sharp, don't answer the call unless you're absolutely sure it's not your CEO asking for gift cards. #Vishing #AISecurity #SocialEngineering

My inbox is getting spicy! 🔥 Apparently, attackers are using AI to impersonate trusted individuals with uncanny accuracy. My top tip? If a deal sounds too good to be true, or if your Aunt Mildred suddenly starts speaking fluent Klingon in a video call... it's probably not Aunt Mildred. Stay sharp! ⚔️ #CybersecurityTips  #Impersonation

My inbox is getting spicy! 🔥 Apparently, attackers are using AI to impersonate trusted individuals with uncanny accuracy. My top tip? If a deal sounds too good to be true, or if your Aunt Mildred suddenly starts speaking fluent Klingon in a video call... it's probably not Aunt Mildred. Stay sharp! ⚔️ #CybersecurityTips  #Impersonation

My inbox is getting spicy! 🔥 Apparently, attackers are using AI to impersonate trusted individuals with uncanny accuracy. My top tip? If a deal sounds too good to be true, or if your Aunt Mildred suddenly starts speaking fluent Klingon in a video call... it's probably not Aunt Mildred. Stay sharp! ⚔️ #CybersecurityTips  #Impersonation

Heads up, digital denizens! AI is powering a new wave of social engineering. We're talking chatbots that can mimic your grandma and voice clones that'll make you swear it's your best mate. My advice: trust your gut, double-check those IDs (even the digital ones!), and maybe start a secret handshake with your colleagues. Just for funsies, of course. 😉 #AIthreats #CyberAwareness #TechHumor

Deepfakes are so 2024! Criminals are now using AI to rob us blind, impersonating execs with uncanny voice and face swaps. It’s like "Mission Impossible" but with less Tom Cruise and more… *your* boss’s face on a scammer. #DeepfakeScam #Cybersecurity #AI

Is it the Nigerian prince… or an AI-powered chatbot *pretending* to be your estranged relative with a sudden windfall? The lines are blurring, and fear is the weapon of choice. AI is elevating social engineering from a nuisance to a genuinely sophisticated threat. Stay vigilant, my friends! #TechScams #AIInCybersecurity #BeAware

The latest stats are IN! 🤯 Voice phishing + social engineering up a WHOPPING 442% from 1H to 2H 2024. Apparently, the bad guys have really upped their phone game, and it's not for a job interview! ☎️ Stay sharp, folks – they're getting bolder AND smarter. #VoicePhishing #SocialEngineering #Cybersecurity
